verses.verse: And when the people <WH5971> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Mosheh <WH4872> delayed <WH954> <WH8765> to come down <WH3381> <WH8800> out of the mount <WH2022>, the people <WH5971> gathered themselves together <WH6950> <WH8735> unto Aharon <WH175>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>, make <WH6213> <WH8798> us 'elohim <WH430>, which shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> us; for as for this Mosheh <WH4872>, the man <WH376> that brought <WH5927> <WH8689> us up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, we wot <WH3045> <WH8804> not what is become of him.

And Aharon <WH175> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Break off <WH6561> <WH8761> the golden <WH2091> earrings <WH5141>, which are in the ears <WH241> of your wives <WH802>, of your sons <WH1121>, and of your daughters <WH1323>, and bring <WH935> <WH8685> them unto me.
And all the people <WH5971> brake off <WH6561> <WH8691> the golden <WH2091> earrings <WH5141> which were in their ears <WH241>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> them unto Aharon <WH175>.

And he received <WH3947> <WH8799> them at their hand <WH3027>, and fashioned <WH6696> <WH8799> it with a graving tool <WH2747>, after he had made <WH6213> <WH8799> it a molten <WH4541> calf <WH5695>: and they said <WH559> <WH8799>, These be thy 'elohim <WH430>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which brought <WH5927> <WH8689> thee up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And when Aharon <WH175> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> it, he built <WH1129> <WH8799> an altar <WH4196> before <WH6440> it; and Aharon <WH175> made proclamation <WH7121> <WH8799>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, To morrow <WH4279> is a feast <WH2282> to the YY <WH3068>.

And they rose up early <WH7925> <WH8686> on the morrow <WH4283>, and offered <WH5927> <WH8686> burnt offerings <WH5930>, and brought <WH5066> <WH8686> peace offerings <WH8002>; and the people <WH5971> sat <WH3427> <WH8799> down to eat <WH398> <WH8800> and to drink <WH8354> <WH8800>, and rose up <WH6965> <WH8799> to play <WH6711> <WH8763>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, get thee down <WH3381> <WH8798>; for thy people <WH5971>, which thou broughtest <WH5927> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, have corrupted <WH7843> <WH8765> themselves:

They have turned <WH5493> <WH8804> aside quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which I commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them: they have made <WH6213> <WH8804> them a molten <WH4541> calf <WH5695>, and have worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> it, and have sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> thereunto, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, These be thy 'elohim <WH430>, O Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which have brought thee up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, I have seen <WH7200> <WH8804> this people <WH5971>, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people <WH5971>:

Now therefore let me alone <WH3240> <WH8685>, that my wrath <WH639> may wax hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against them, and that I may consume <WH3615> <WH8762> them: and I will make <WH6213> <WH8799> of thee a great <WH1419> nation <WH1471>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> besought <WH2470> <WH8762> <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH3068>, why doth thy wrath <WH639> wax hot <WH2734> <WH8799> against thy people <WH5971>, which thou hast brought forth <WH3318> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with great <WH1419> power <WH3581>, and with a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027> ?

Wherefore should the Egyptians <WH4714> speak <WH559> <WH8799>, and say <WH559> <WH8800>, For mischief <WH7451> did he bring <WH3318> <WH8689> them out, to slay <WH2026> <WH8800> them in the mountains <WH2022>, and to consume <WH3615> <WH8763> them from the face <WH6440> of the earth <WH127>? Turn <WH7725> <WH8798> from thy fierce <WH2740> wrath <WH639>, and repent <WH5162> <WH8734> of this evil <WH7451> against thy people <WH5971>.

Remember <WH2142> <WH8798> Avraham <WH85>, Yitz'chak <WH3327>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478>, thy servants <WH5650>, to whom thou swarest <WH7650> <WH8738> by thine own self, and saidst <WH1696> <WH8762> unto them, I will multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> your seed <WH2233> as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064>, and all this land <WH776> that I have spoken <WH559> <WH8804> of will I give <WH5414> <WH8799> unto your seed <WH2233>, and they shall inherit <WH5157> <WH8804> it for ever <WH5769>.
And the YY <WH3068> repented <WH5162> <WH8735> of the evil <WH7451> which he thought <WH1696> <WH8765> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> unto his people <WH5971>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> turned <WH6437> <WH8799>, and went down <WH3381> <WH8799> from the mount <WH2022>, and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the testimony <WH5715> were in his hand <WH3027>: the tables <WH3871> were written <WH3789> <WH8803> on both <WH8147> their sides <WH5676>; on the one side and on the other were they written <WH3789> <WH8803>.
And the tables <WH3871> were the work <WH4639> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and the writing <WH4385> was the writing <WH4385> of 'Elohim <WH430>, graven <WH2801> <WH8803> upon the tables <WH3871>.

And when Y'hoshuw`a <WH3091> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the noise <WH6963> of the people <WH5971> as they shouted <WH7452>, he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, There is a noise <WH6963> of war <WH4421> in the camp <WH4264>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, It is not the voice <WH6963> of them that shout <WH6030> <WH8800> for mastery <WH1369>, neither is it the voice <WH6963> of them that cry <WH6030> <WH8800> for being overcome <WH2476>: but the noise <WH6963> of them that sing <WH6031> <WH8763> do I hear <WH8085> <WH8802>.

And it came to pass, as soon as he came nigh <WH7126> <WH8804> unto the camp <WH4264>, that he saw <WH7200> <WH8799> the calf <WH5695>, and the dancing <WH4246>: and Mosheh <WH4872> ' anger <WH639> waxed hot <WH2734> <WH8799>, and he cast <WH7993> <WH8686> the tables <WH3871> out of his hands <WH3027>, and brake <WH7665> <WH8762> them beneath <WH8478> the mount <WH2022>.

And he took <WH3947> <WH8799> the calf <WH5695> which they had made <WH6213> <WH8804>, and burnt <WH8313> <WH8799> it in the fire <WH784>, and ground <WH2912> <WH8799> it to powder <WH1854> <WH8804>, and strawed <WH2219> <WH8799> it upon <WH6440> the water <WH4325>, and made the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> drink <WH8248> <WH8686> of it.

And Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Aharon <WH175>, What did <WH6213> <WH8804> this people <WH5971> unto thee, that thou hast brought <WH935> <WH8689> so great <WH1419> a sin <WH2401> upon them?

And Aharon <WH175> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Let not the anger <WH639> of my lord <WH113> wax hot <WH2734> <WH8799>: thou knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> the people <WH5971>, that they are set on mischief <WH7451>.

For they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Make <WH6213> <WH8798> us 'elohim <WH430>, which shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> us: for as for this Mosheh <WH4872>, the man <WH376> that brought us up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, we wot <WH3045> <WH8804> not what is become of him.

And I said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Whosoever hath any gold <WH2091>, let them break <WH6561> <WH8690> it off. So they gave <WH5414> <WH8799> it me: then I cast <WH7993> <WH8686> it into the fire <WH784>, and there came out <WH3318> <WH8799> this calf <WH5695>.

And when Mosheh <WH4872> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the people <WH5971> were naked <WH6544> <WH8803>; (for Aharon <WH175> had made them naked <WH6544> <WH8804> unto their shame <WH8103> among their enemies <WH6965> <WH8801>:)

Then Mosheh <WH4872> stood <WH5975> <WH8799> in the gate <WH8179> of the camp <WH4264>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who is on the YY'S <WH3068> side? let him come unto me. And all the sons <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> gathered <WH622> <WH8735> themselves together unto him.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Put <WH7760> <WH8798> every man <WH376> his sword <WH2719> by his side <WH3409>, and go <WH5674> <WH8798> in and out <WH7725> <WH8798> from gate <WH8179> to gate <WH8179> throughout the camp <WH4264>, and slay <WH2026> <WH8798> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251>, and every man <WH376> his companion <WH7453>, and every man <WH376> his neighbour <WH7138>.

And the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> did <WH6213> <WH8799> according to the word <WH1697> of Mosheh <WH4872>: and there fell <WH5307> <WH8799> of the people <WH5971> that day <WH3117> about three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men <WH376>.

For Mosheh <WH4872> had said <WH559> <WH8799>, Consecrate yourselves <WH4390> <WH8798> <WH3027> to day <WH3117> to the YY <WH3068>, even <WH3588> every man <WH376> upon his son <WH1121>, and upon his brother <WH251>; that he may bestow <WH5414> <WH8800> upon you a b'rakhah <WH1293> this day <WH3117>.

And it came to pass on the morrow <WH4283>, that Mosheh <WH4872> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the people <WH5971>, Ye have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> a great <WH1419> sin <WH2401>: and now I will go up <WH5927> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>; peradventure <WH194> I shall make an atonement <WH3722> <WH8762> for <WH1157> your sin <WH2403>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Oh <WH577>, this people <WH5971> have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> a great <WH1419> sin <WH2401>, and have made <WH6213> <WH8799> them 'elohim <WH430> of gold <WH2091>.
Yet now, if thou wilt forgive <WH5375> <WH8799> their sin <WH2403> --; and if not, blot <WH4229> <WH8798> me, I pray thee, out of thy book <WH5612> which thou hast written <WH3789> <WH8804>.
And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Whosoever <WH834> hath sinned <WH2398> <WH8804> against me, him will I blot out <WH4229> <WH8799> of my book <WH5612>.

Therefore now go <WH3212> <WH8798>, lead <WH5148> <WH8798> the people <WH5971> unto the place of which I have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> unto thee: behold, mine Angel <WH4397> shall go <WH3212> <WH8799> before <WH6440> thee: nevertheless in the day <WH3117> when I visit <WH6485> <WH8800> I will visit <WH6485> <WH8804> their sin <WH2403> upon them.
And the YY <WH3068> plagued <WH5062> <WH8799> the people <WH5971>, because <WH834> they made <WH6213> <WH8804> the calf <WH5695>, which <WH834> Aharon <WH175> made <WH6213> <WH8804>.
